mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
INSERT INTO t_gq_fss_loan (id,cust_no,user_no,acc_no,contract_id,contract_amt,pay_amt,transfer_time,trade_type,seq_no,mortgagee_acc_no,create_time,mchn_parent,mchn_child,loan_platform) VALUES (null,#{custNo},#{userNo},#{accNo},#{contractId},#{contractAmt},#{payAmt},#{transferTime},#{tradeType},#{seqNo},#{mortgageeAccNo},#{createTime},#{mchnParent},#{mchnChild},#{loanPlatform})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
INSERT INTO `t_gq_fss_enter_account` (id,contract_id,acc_no,trade_type,mortgagee_acc_no,seq_no,create_time,mchn_parent,mchn_child,serial_number,accounting_no) VALUES (null,#{contractId},#{accNo},#{tradeType},#{mortgageeAccNo},#{seqNo},#{createTime},#{mchnParent},#{mchnChild},#{serialNumber},#{accountingNo})
